sentences.en: Although they're expensive, they last forever and never go out of style.
sentences.cn: 尽管价格昂贵，但它们经久耐用，永不过时。

sentences.en: He was forever attempting to arrange deals.
He’s forever making comments about my weight.
I think that we will live together forever.
sentences.cn: 我想我们会永远生活在一起。

sentences.en: I wanted that moment to last forever .
sentences.cn: 我希望那一刻成为永远。

sentences.en: I wanted that moment to last forever.
sentences.cn: 我希望那一刻成为永远。

sentences.en: I was forever dragging him away from the fireplace.
sentences.cn: 我老是要把他从壁炉边拉开。

sentences.en: I'm forever on a diet, since I put on weight easily.
sentences.cn: 我永远都在减肥，因为我很容易长胖。

sentences.en: If there ever comes a day, when we can't be together, keep me in your heart. I'll stay there forever.
sentences.cn: 若不能长相厮守，请把我留在你心间，我将永驻于此。

sentences.en: It seemed as if she'd been gone forever.
sentences.cn: 好像她已经永远地离开了。
凯瑟琳总是神神秘秘的。

sentences.en: Many valuable works of art were lost forever.
sentences.cn: 许许多多珍贵的艺术品永远消失了。

sentences.en: She was forever running errands for her housebound grandmother.
sentences.cn: 她总是在为她不方便外出的祖母跑前跑后。

sentences.en: The drive seemed to take forever.
sentences.cn: 车似乎永远也开不到头。
他们的生活完全改变了。

sentences.en: They didn't cost anything and they lasted forever.
sentences.cn: 它们花不了多少钱，却非常耐用。

sentences.en: They were through. They wanted out. Forever.
sentences.cn: 他们受够了，他们想要解脱，永远的解脱。

sentences.en: They're forever bitching about everybody else.
To this end the young child is forever watchful.
sentences.cn: 这个年纪不大的孩子为此始终保持警惕。
